units.name: Squire
units.effect: Give a friendly unit on this tile (not this unit) +1/0/0.  If this unit helps win a tile, Trash it and gain a copy of a friendly unit on this tile.

units.effect: Adjacent tiles get +1/+1/0.  This tile is worth +1 Influence.

units.effect: Your units ignore traps on this tile.

units.effect: Replace this tile.

units.name: Thief
units.effect: If this is the only non-Commoner unit on this tile, gain 1 Influence.

units.name: Bullfighter
units.effect: If you win this tile, gain +1 Influence for each unit on it.

units.name: City Planner
units.effect: Next turn, draw one extra tile, no matter how many other city planners there are in play this turn.

units.effect: Announce: Move a unit from this tile to another tile.
